name: Hot Hands Value Pack 10pk
categoryPath: Sports & Outdoors/Outdoor Sports/Camping/Camping Accessories/Compasses & Survival Kits

reviews.name: Hot Hands Value Pack 10pk
reviews.reviewText: My 7th grade group tested grabber, hot hands, and Amex. To test these products we had tin foil boxes with a themudre inside with hand wamers. The results are hot hands 106.8, Amex 100.1, grabber 99.3 in degrees.
reviews.title: We tested hot hands was best

reviews.name: Hot Hands Value Pack 10pk
reviews.reviewText: As a Freezer order worker, this helps me out a lot. I stay up to 9 hours in the freezer without actually feeling me fingers go norm or frozen. Hence i do more work and get the Bonus.
reviews.title: Thumbs up

reviews.name: Hot Hands Value Pack 10pk
reviews.reviewText: Used these when i was in the army, and my friends still use them when they go through basic. They keep you warm but not over warm. Give them a min to warm up and then your good to go. Great product :D
reviews.title: Great

reviews.name: Hot Hands Value Pack 10pk
reviews.reviewText: These are super handy! They fit in a glove, a pocket, even a shoe or a sock. My hands get cold and then the aches and pains start. These really help with that issue. Wish I had invented them.
reviews.title: No more cold hands!

reviews.name: Hot Hands Value Pack 10pk
reviews.reviewText: Gets warm enough to keep few degrees Warner in your gloves. Don't expect them to get hot like the water in your sink...
reviews.title: 03 October 2013
